data.title: Service Information
data.description: Description of the cloud waf service, including the current service version, region, price, and function description.

list.name: Web Application Firewall
list.features: 10 domain names can be protected (number of top-level domain names: 1)  Service bandwidth: 100 Mbit/s (for web applications on HUAWEI CLOUD) 30 Mbit/s (for web applications outside HUAWEI CLOUD) \/ 2,000 QPS of service requests 6,000 WAF-to-server connections per domain
